document.full_text: libyan leader muammar gaddafi and his allies, facing a bombing campaign by western nations, may be exploring exile options, although it is unclear if he would seriously contemplate stepping aside, secretary of state hillary clinton said on tuesday.
document.title: clinton: gaddafi, allies may be seeking way out: report
lines_and_colors: libyan leader muammar gaddafi and his allies, facing a bombing campaign by western nations, may be exploring exile options, although it is unclear if he would seriously contemplate stepping aside, secretary of state hillary clinton said on tuesday.
